Title: Viktor's Research Proposal
Description: Viktor has some new ideas to take NanoMed into a new direction. He thinks it would be worthwhile to develop even more variations of the current nanobot medical drones. The process will take a while and will require consistent funding, but Viktor is committed to leading the research.

Title: Missing Nanobots
Description: A batch of nanobots has gone missing. The finished nanobots are stored in secure locations throughout Hawaii, but someone has managed to acquire a small sample for unknown purposes. Not much can be done without further investigation into the matter.

Title: Develop New Facilities
Description: As expansion operations have commenced, you can now try and set up new NanoMed facilities for development and storage outside of Hawaii. There is a proposal to set up 3 main branches out of Hawaii in San Francisco, CA, Chicago, IL, and another in Washington, D.C.
